newsArray.title: Ricky Ponting left perplexed with Shreyas Iyer's limited role in Indian team
newsArray.description: Shreyas Iyer was one of India’s best performers in the ODI World Cup 2023. He scored 530 runs in 11 matches and that was expected to have sealed his spot in the ODI team, if not in all three formats but the Indian team management had a different idea. The Rohit Sharma-led side played only three ODIs in 2024 and in the first two matches, Iyer featured in the playing XI but was dropped from the third as the returning Rishabh Pant was given the opportunity.

newsArray.title: चाहे टी-20 हो या वनडे, डेब्यू मैच में हर्षित का दिखा जलवा, कन्कशन सब्स्टीट्यूट मामले पर भी तोड़ी चुप्पी
creator: Sunit Sharma
newsArray.description: टी-20 की तरह ही वनडे में भी हर्षित ने की कमाल की गेंदबाजीइंग्लैंड के खिलाफ पहले वनडे में चटकाए तीन विकेटभारत ने सीरीज के पहले वनडे में 4 विकेटों से इंग्लैंड को दी मात

newsArray.title: Pakistan Tri-Series 2025 Live Streaming, Channel, Time, Date: Where And How To Watch Live In India
creator: ABP News Bureau
newsArray.description: Pakistan Tri-Series 2025 Live Streaming, Telecast: The Pakistan-hosted tri-series kicks off on February 8, featuring Pakistan, South Africa, and New Zealand.The tri-series comprises four matches, culminating in the final on February 14. With an ODI tri-series making a return to international cricket after a long time, fans can expect plenty of thrilling action.Indian viewers can watch the live telecast of Pakistan-hosted tri-series on Sony Sports Ten 5, while live streaming of the Pakistan-hosted tri-series will be available on the SonyLIV app with a subscription.The series opener will see Pakistan face New Zealand at Gaddafi Stadium, one of the key venues for the upcoming ICC Champions Trophy 2025. This tri-series is seen as a preparation for ICC Champions Trophy 2025, set to begin on February 19.Check below Pakistan-hosted tri-series live streaming, telecast in India detailsWhere Will Pakistan, New Zealand and South Africa Tri-Nation Series take place?Pakistan, New Zealand and South Africa Tri-Nation Series will be held at the Gaddafi Stadium in Lahore and National Stadium in Karachi.What time will Pakistan, New Zealand and South Africa Tri-Nation Series begin?Pakistan-hosted Tri-Nation Series kicks off with Pakistan facing New Zealand at Gaddafi Stadium, starting at 2:30 PM IST.In the second match, New Zealand will take on South Africa at 10:00 AM IST.The third match will feature Pakistan against South Africa, with a 2:30 PM IST start time.The final match of the series is also scheduled to begin at 2:30 PM IST.Where to watch Tri-Nation Series Live On TV In India?Live streaming of Pakistan, New Zealand and South Africa Tri-Nation Series can be viewed on Sony Sports TEN 5 on TV in India. Where to watch Tri-Nation Series Live on OTT In India?Live streaming of Pakistan, New Zealand and South Africa Tri-Nation Series can be viewed on FanCode app in India.Where To watch Tri-Nation Series Live Streaming in Pakistan?Fans in Pakistan can watch Tri-Nation series live streaming on Ten Sports, PTV Sports HD, and A Sports. Live streaming of the Tri-Nation series in Pakistan will be available on Tamasha, Tapmad & Myco app in Pakistan.

After winning the toss and opted to take first strike, reaNorth Essequiboched a competitive 115-9 from the reduced 16-overs, while President’s X1 [...]The post North Essequibo cart off ECB Busta-sponsored T20 trophy appeared first on Kaieteur News.

newsArray.description: Kaieteur Sports- North Essequibo carted off the 2025 Essequibo Cricket Board (ECB) Busta-sponsored T20 trophy after beating a President’s X1 by 22 runs last Sunday at Imam Bacchus ground, Essequibo Coast, Region 2.
